ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Code Red
ComicInfo.Summary:
Recruited for the Realm Knights, Brittany (last name, can't remember? Walters?) finds herself facing the Dark Horde on a regular basis. But with a new leader in the Dark Queen the Horde is getting ready to launch their ultimate attack. Don't miss this new miniseries that ties directly into the upcoming milestone Grimm Fairy Tales #100.
